TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ThemeInfoAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ThemeInfoAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ThemeInfoAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定主题字典在程序集中的存储位置。

span.span: Specifies the location in which theme dictionaries are stored for an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在程序集级别使用，以指示由程序集为其定义的控件和资源字典所在位置声明的主题资源字典。This attribute is used at the assembly level to indicate which theme resource dictionaries are being declared by an assembly for its defined controls, and where the resource dictionaries are located. 例如，如果不提供特定于主题的资源字典，并且为所有资源查找提供资源定义的 `generic.xaml` 编译到该程序集的控件类定义所在的同一程序集中，则您将在该程序集项目的 `AssemblyInfo.cs` 中应用以下特性：For example, if you do not provide theme-specific resource dictionaries, and your `generic.xaml` that supplies resource definitions for all resource lookups is compiled into the same assembly in which the assembly's control class definitions exist, you would apply the following attribution in the `AssemblyInfo.cs` for the assembly project: `[assembly:ThemeInfoAttribute(ResourceDictionaryLocation.None, ResourceDictionaryLocation.SourceAssembly)]` 除了 应用程序之外，项目和程序集必须具有其他特征，以便 WPF 主题系统可以使用资源字典。In addition to application, your project and assembly must have additional characteristics in order for the resource dictionaries to be usable by the WPF theming system. - 如果声明 ，则引用的资源字典应置于程序集结构中的 `themes` 目录内。If you declare , then the referenced resource dictionary should be placed within a `themes` directory in the assembly structure. - 如果为 声明 ，则 XAML 文件的名称应符合 XAML 文件命名方案 `themes\..xaml`。If you declare for , then the names of the XAML files are expected to conform to the XAML file naming scheme `themes\..xaml`. 例如，以下是在客户端上支持各种可能的 WPF 主题方案的主题文件列表：For example, the following is a list of theme files that support a variety of possible WPF theming scenarios on clients: - `themes\luna.normalcolor.xaml` - `themes\luna.homestead.xaml` - `themes\luna.metallic.xaml` - `themes\royale.normalcolor.xaml` - `themes\aero.normalcolor.xaml` - `themes\classic.xaml` - 如果声明 ，则外部程序集名称应符合命名方案，并且每个主题的每个程序集都应使用相同的密钥信息进行生成。If you declare , then the external assembly names are expected to conform to a naming scheme, and each assembly for each theme should be built using the same key information. 有关如何创建和使用主题资源字典的详细信息，请参阅主题[控件创作概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview)的 "在主题级别定义资源" 部分。For more information about how to create and use theme resource dictionaries, see "Defining Resources at the Theme Level" section of the topic [Control Authoring Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.ResourceDictionaryLocation themeDictionaryLocation, valuetype System.Windows.ResourceDictionaryLocation genericDictionaryLocation) cil managed
Public Sub New (themeDictionaryLocation As ResourceDictionaryLocation, genericDictionaryLocation As ResourceDictionaryLocation)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: themeDictionaryLocation
param.span: 特定于主题资源的位置。

param.name: genericDictionaryLocation
param.span: 泛型资源的位置，而非特定于主题资源的位置。

span.span: The location of generic, not theme-specific, resources.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并创建一个特性，该特性定义类型的主题字典在程序集中的位置。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and creates an attribute that defines theme dictionary locations for types in an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `themeDictionaryLocation` 时，可以包含 Luna.normalcolor.xaml 等文件。When the `themeDictionaryLocation` is , you can include files such as Luna.NormalColor.xaml. 这些名称由系统主题文件定义，其中包括以下各项。These names are defined by the system theme files, which include the following. 经典-windows XP 上的 "经典" Windows 9x/2000 查看。Classic - "Classic" Windows 9x/2000 look on Windows XP. Luna.normalcolor.xaml-Windows XP 上的默认蓝色主题。Luna.NormalColor - Default blue theme on Windows XP. Homestead-Windows XP 上的橄榄色主题。Luna.Homestead - Olive theme on Windows XP. Luna-Windows XP 上的银色主题。Luna.Metallic - Silver theme on Windows XP. Royale. Luna.normalcolor.xaml-Windows XP Media Center Edition 上的默认主题。Royale.NormalColor - Default theme on Windows XP Media Center Edition. Luna.normalcolor.xaml-Windows Vista 上的默认主题Aero.NormalColor - Default theme on Windows Vista
